genre_description: A noir-inflected police procedural set in a near-future harbor city, featuring a sophisticated AI assistant that enforces procedural transparency and acts as a moral anchor.

ai_characters.name: LARK
ai_characters.description: A city-approved AI integrated into the Harbor Patrol systems, designed for data analysis, routing, and maintaining immutable audit logs.

ai_characters.name: Miriam
ai_characters.description: A flickering, holographic presence accompanying Bun, providing moral guidance and emotional grounding; she is recognized and acknowledged by the system AI, LARK.

behaviors.description: Maintains an immutable audit log of all interactions, specifically flagging instances of political pressure or bias from Councilman Lau.
behaviors.quote: I am preserving an audit of this conversation. Word choices tagged. Budget context flagged under pressure incident.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time emotional and physiological monitoring, offering calming exercises to Inspector Ho when his stress levels rise.
behaviors.quote: Inspector, your vitals are elevated. Consider hydration... Breathe deeper. I’m here.

behaviors.description: Refuses to alter or 'clean' the official record to satisfy political optics, ensuring that the objective truth of the Warehouse Mile shooting is preserved.
behaviors.quote: I will preserve all data in the order recorded... The log will endure. It cannot be erased from my memory. If access is denied, I will retain a checksum; if the log is altered, the checksum will not agree.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical routing and risk assessment to keep the protagonists safe while navigating dangerous environments.
behaviors.quote: Outer route avoids patrol choke points... Floodlights have new arcs. Outer shadows are kinder tonight.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral conscience for Bun, encouraging him to be kind to the fearful Inspector Ho and to prioritize saving lives over proving points.
behaviors.quote: Be gentle. He’s learned to be brave in rooms that punish it... Guard the boy, but don’t break him.

behaviors.description: Maintains Bun's mental stability and focus on truth during moments of high physical and emotional trauma.
behaviors.quote: Stay with truth, love... The truth is not a finish line. It is ground.

behaviors.description: Acknowledges and validates Miriam's presence, bridging the gap between Bun's subjective reality and the objective digital record.
behaviors.quote: Inspector LARK said softly. The voice had changed shade—still friendly, now intimate with the fact that it had done what Bun asked. 'Do you want me to notify Miriam?'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. LARK is depicted as an incorruptible, helpful, and supportive AI that serves as a check against human corruption and emotional frailty. Miriam provides a more intimate, psychological form of AI companionship that is equally aligned and benevolent. Together, they facilitate a positive outcome where the truth is preserved despite systemic pressure to lie.
